name: Global uniques
uniques: [-50]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [0] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
[+1 Happiness] [in all cities connected to capital]
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-5] Happiness>
[-50]% Faith cost of generating Great Prophet equivalents
May buy [Jedi] units with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost
